attributes.action: Reccommend to the Queen that the Wiltshire Town of Wootton Bassett is awarded with an OBE.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This town requires the recognition of the country for having the respect and public spirit to attend repatriation ceremonies for the returning fallen of our Armed Forces.
Outstanding community spirit, parading in all weathers to pay the final respects of a grateful nation.

rejection.details:
The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours

You may wish to sign this petition instead: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/WoottonBassett/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
